main event: An overhead traveling light was observed in Newark, Ohio on August 23, 1962, moving almost due North before disappearing just above the horizon.
interesting points: The light was observed as a steady source that did not change in brightness., The length of the observation lasted 30 minutes., Insufficient data was available for further analysis., A request for additional information was made by the USAF to the witness following the sighting., The report considered it possibly a high flying aircraft.
sighted object: a steady light in the sky
witness description: The witness was alone, located 1 mile north of the Pickerington, Ohio city limits.
